thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Yueda Investment Expect To Swing To Net Loss In 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Yueda Investment Expect To Swing To Net Loss In 2017

organizations.name: reuters) - jiangsu yueda investment co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Jiangsu Yueda Investment Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT EXPECT TO SWING TO NET LOSS OF 250-300 MILLION YUAN ($39.54-47.45 million)IN 2017 VERSUS NET PROFIT OF 110.15 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2EpJq6k Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3230 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
